jobDescription: Castlight Health’s Data Engineering  team is seeking a summer intern based in San Francisco, CA. Come join us on our  mission and help change healthcare for the better with a data-driven approach!  As an intern, you will have the unique opportunity to work with a team of experienced  Data Engineers and Data Scientists building products that ingests large  disparate sets of healthcare. The team is passionate about writing data driven  applications, dealing with large sets of imperfect data, and designing scalable  multi-tier systems to process it.  You will work with the team applying data and software engineering techniques  working with data and infrastructure to scale our pipelines and automate our  processes. Internship Duration: May - August 2018 Internship Program Experience: In your 12-week internship, you will  be paired with a mentor on the team. Expect to network with executives across  departments, participate in intern-only events and programs, experience the  Castlight culture, and have fun in San Francisco! Pursuing  a Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science or related fieldExperience  with Python and SQLInterest  in data and data engineeringComputer  Science fundamentals: object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm  design.Demonstrated  ability to work well as a member of a software teamExperience/knowledge  of Airflow a plus
